bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Permissive tax exemption for land and improvements of local authority

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: Section 809 (4) (g) (ii) of the Local Government Act must be read as if the reference to "the council" were a reference to "the board".
Subsection (1) is deemed to have come into force on April 30, 2004, and is retroactive to the extent necessary to give it effect on and after that date.
